description:
In nova.virt.hyperv.livemigrationops, in the check_can_live_migrate_source method, the instance is passed as an argument to the logger, instead of as a key-value argument. Because of this, the log message is never printed: [1]


[1] http://paste.openstack.org/show/614164/
title: hyperv: Bad log message formating in livemigrationops

comments.content:
In nova.virt.hyperv.livemigrationops, in the check_can_live_migrate_source method, the instance is passed as an argument to the logger, instead of as a key-value argument. Because of this, the log message is never printed: [1]


[1] http://paste.openstack.org/show/614164/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cbelu

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/479245
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/479245
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=2a42776205f921c5b6e3186e8f043af758bbc494
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 2a42776205f921c5b6e3186e8f043af758bbc494
Author: Claudiu Belu <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Jun 30 13:10:14 2017 +0300

    hyperv: Fixes log message in livemigrationops
    
    The instance should be passed as key-value argument to the
    logger.
    
    Change-Id: Id59f709a0c40dccdc75212816f97298cd9a6d521
    Closes-Bug: #1701511
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 16.0.0.0b3 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
